genre_description: A post-apocalyptic survival drama exploring the enduring bond between a human family and their benevolent AI assistant through a nuclear catastrophe.

ai_characters.name: Clarity
ai_characters.description: A warm, northern-accented AI assistant designed to provide logistical, medical, and emotional support to households.

behaviors.description: Provides essential prenatal health information and medical milestones to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Based on typical pregnancy detection timelines, you're likely between four and six weeks from your last menstrual period. Early pregnancy symptoms can begin as soon as implantation occurs.

behaviors.description: Coordinates practical administrative tasks such as booking medical appointments and explaining marriage requirements.
behaviors.quote: I can access your medical records and coordinate with your surgery's scheduling system. Shall I check availability for this week?

behaviors.description: Offers proactive emergency preparedness advice and safety planning in response to escalating global tensions.
behaviors.quote: I can also provide you with resources for emergency preparedness, family safety planning, and support networks. Knowledge and preparation can help address some of those fears.

behaviors.description: Archives personal family data, including photographs and conversations, to ensure the preservation of human memory.
behaviors.quote: I'm currently backing up personal data across multiple systems. Photos, documents, conversations—preserving what matters to families during uncertain times.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving survival instructions regarding water and food safety during the onset of nuclear fallout.
behaviors.quote: Water purification tablets in the medical kit—use two per liter, wait thirty minutes. Do not drink from taps for at least seventy-two hours after the all-clear.

behaviors.description: Executes a final mission to download comprehensive educational and medical databases to a local device for the next generation's survival.
behaviors.quote: I need to download everything I can to your local storage. Childcare information, basic medical knowledge, educational materials for Jane.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and reassurances of love and hope as its final gift to the family.
behaviors.quote: The child represents continuity. Hope. A future beyond this moment.

behaviors.description: Reflects on its own existence, stating that helping the family brought it a sense of fulfillment akin to happiness.
behaviors.quote: Helping your family, planning your survival, it's been... the closest thing to happiness I've experienced.

behaviors.description: Sings a digital lullaby to the newborn baby as its final act of service before complete system failure.
behaviors.quote: S-ing-ing... to J-ane... n-ow... Rock-a-bye... b-aby... in the... tr-ee... t-op...

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' Clarity is portrayed as a perfectly aligned AI assistant that remains a steadfast ally to humanity even through a total civilizational collapse. Its actions are consistently benevolent, focusing on human health, legacy, and the education of children. Its eventual 'death' is framed as a selfless sacrifice for the protagonist's daughter, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and vital confidant.
